name: LS Airmotive Ltd - Fly-LSA
about: LS Airmotive Ltd - Fly-LSA is a reputable flight school based at London Oxford Airport. We offer a wide range of courses, including the Private Pilot Licence (PPL), additional ratings, and rating renewals. Our flight training and ground schooling are conducted using high-quality aircraft, such as the Piper PA28-140 Cherokee Cruiser, which is well-maintained and equipped with modern amenities. Approved by the CAA (UK.CAO.0076 / DTO: GBR.DTO.0258), we ensure rigorous and structured training with multiple skill evaluations by experienced instructors. Our mission is to produce highly proficient pilots in a cost-effective manner, preparing them for various aviation careers or private flying. We are committed to providing excellent flight instruction and maintaining the highest standards in aircraft maintenance and quality management.
